Posts.Content: Thank you so much for replying it’s so comforting to know that there are others out there on a similar treatment plan. I’m sorry for this late reply but I’ve only just got use to using the site. I’m due for a second CT scan next week. I find the worse part is going back to the oncologist for the results. I’m always so fearful. Sending all best wishes.
Posts.Title: letrozole, how effective is it.

Posts.Content: Thanks dear for getting in touch. The kindness I’ve received restores my faith in humanity. I find the hardest part is the unpredictable nature of cancer. But, today I’m okay. I never say I’m battling cancer. My approach is I’m living with it. Still hate it though!!
Posts.Title: letrozole, how effective is it.

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with grade two breast cancer in June 2018 which has spread into my bones. The breast cancer team at my local hospital decided not to perform breast surgery, I’m in my seventies. I have been prescribed Letrozole. However, I’m confused I’ve read that Letrozole is more effective after the primary site cancer has been removed. Any help please.
Posts.Title: letrozole, how effective is it.

Posts.Content: Sorry for the late reply. I’m still getting use to using the site. Thanks so much for this. I’m having no side effects from Letrozole. But waiting to see if it’s working effectively seems interminable. Pleased your Aunt is responding well.
Posts.Title: letrozole, how effective is it.
